General.Name: Shenzhen KTC Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen KTC Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of smart display products in China. Its product portfolio include commercial displays, including interactive flat panel, signage monitor, professional display equipment, commercial TV, LCD video wall, and digital signage; medical displays, such as diagnostic radiology display, endoscope monitor, radiation integrated display, consultation screen of imaging center, ultrasound image display, and integrated display; smart mirror display products comprising smart fitness mirror, smart beauty mirror, smart rehabilitation mirror, smart fitting mirror, smart bathroom mirror, and smart control center; and mobile smart display products, including mobile smart screen. The company also offers smart accessory products, including smart stylus, projectors, smart conference combiner, and drive-free infrared touch fram; industrial high-brightness modules products; and panelnet, an application software. In addition, it engages in the research and development, manufacturing, sales, and services of audio-visual and related products, such as smart interactive panels, professional display products, innovative display products, smart TVs, etc. Shenzhen KTC Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
